A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Average rating 3.3?  What the hell\, are you people on crack?  This movie was AWESOME.  In case you were unaware\, good films subvert your expectations\, not just fulfill them.  Honestly\, if all you wanted was more of the same you should have stayed at home\, ordered a pizza and watched Empire again.  This movie was great.  Not better than Empire (maybe nothing ever will be)\, but absolutely worth your time.  Anyone who tells you otherwise is not to be trusted.
